mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, image_url FROM PRODUCT WHERE product_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{productName}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (user_id, style_category, title, content, thumbnail_image_url) VALUES (#{userId}, #{styleCategory}, #{title}, #{content}, #{thumbnailImageUrl});
INSERT INTO POST_IMAGE (post_image_url, post_id, post_image_order) VALUES (#{postImageUrl}, #{postId}, #{postImageOrder});
mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id, p.user_id, u.user_name, p.style_category, p.title, p.content, p.thumbnail_image_url, p.like_count, p.comment_count, p.view_count, p.save_count, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM POST p JOIN USER u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.image_url, p.price FROM POST_TAG pt JOIN PRODUCT p ON pt.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pt.post_id = #{postId}
SELECT post_id, user_id, style_category, title, content, thumbnail_image_url FROM POST ORDER BY post_id DESC
SELECT post_image_url, post_id, post_image_order FROM POST_IMAGE WHERE post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY post_image_order
SELECT post_id, user_id, style_category, title, content, thumbnail_image_url, like_count, comment_count, view_count, save_count, created_at, updated_at FROM POST WHERE post_id = #{postId}
